location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses trade and financial matters and reports that the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] have returned the property they had taken belonging to the Bushire merchants. The letter also reports news that two people recently came to Bushire to request the surrender of an Ormuse [Hormuz] dow taken by Bushire and that peace negotiations are ongoing in Schiras [Shiraz].
